name: FooterBaseReveal
description: Animated footer reveal wrapper that creates a fixed footer with scroll-triggered reveal effect.

columns.note: Each column must have title and items array

structure.label: string - Link text (required)
structure.href: string - Link destination (optional). External URLs open in new tab, internal values scroll to sections

propsSchema.columns: Array<{ title: string, items: Array<{ label: string, href: string }> }> - Footer navigation columns (required)

usageExample: <FooterBaseReveal columns={[{ title: 'Product', items: [{ label: 'Features', href: 'features' }, { label: 'Pricing', href: 'pricing' }] }]} copyrightText="© 2025 | Company" />
